name: Epic Sword: Shot Sauce
description:
Select your weapon, your gadgets and then your play style as you enter ready to take down all the enemies patrolling the level Epic Sword: Shot Sauce game.

Your main weapon can either be a sword which can deflect bullets, chop down your foes or be thrown for maximum bloodshed. A shield which can be thrown at multiple enemies at once or to reflect their bullets right back at them. A bow for silent long range kills without worrying about ammo. sword and sauce game And finally a machine gun super shot because sometimes the best solution is the loudest one. welcome epic swords game!
